name: Mars Lander
overview: Part of the "4 in 1 Game Pack" and also the simply named "Game Pack". Land your rocket on the many landing pads on the surface of Mars using: Shift for main thrust, period to thrust right (and move left) and comma to thrust left (and move right). The border color indicates landing speed, green is safe to land. Bonus fuel will be given for successful landings. Watch out for Martians!
